text: "No Shopping" is a single by American rapper French Montana, from his mixtape MC4. The track features a guest appearance from Toronto-based rapper Drake. It was released on July 16, 2016. The track was produced by Murda Beatz and Cubeatz. The song was certified Gold by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA) in December 2016, for selling over 500,000 digital copies in the United States. ==Music video== The music video premiered on MTV on July 29, 2016. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- !scope="col"| Chart (2016) !scope="col"| Peak position |- |- ! scope="row"| France (SNEP) | 129 |- |- |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" |- !
